00030 #include "registry.h"
00031  
00032 Registry::Registry(){
00033     return;
00034 }
00035 
00036 bool Registry::init(){
00037     regfile_image="WINE REGISTRY Version 2\n\n";
00038     return TRUE;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void Registry::append(QString reg_keys){
00042     regfile_image.append(reg_keys); 
00043     return;
00044 }
00045 
00046 bool Registry::exec(QObject *parent, QString prefix_name){
00047 
00048     //This function wrights regfile_image into file, then run regedit.exe and import this file. 
00049     //Also, clean files before end
00050 
00051     QTime midnight(0, 0, 0);
00052     qsrand(midnight.secsTo(QTime::currentTime()));
00053     
00054     int file_name = qrand() % 10000;
00055     QString full_file_path = QObject::tr("%1/.config/%2/tmp/%3.reg").arg(QDir::homePath()).arg(APP_SHORT_NAME).arg(file_name);
00056 
00057     QFile file(full_file_path);
00058     file.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly);
00059     file.write(regfile_image.toAscii());        // write to stderr
00060     file.close();
00061 
00062     WineBinLauncher *launcher;
00063 
00064     launcher = new WineBinLauncher(prefix_name);
00065     launcher->show();
00066     launcher->run_exec(parent, "regedit.exe", full_file_path, TRUE);
00067     
00068     if (launcher->exec()==QDialog::Accepted){
00069         return TRUE;
00070     } else {
00071         return FALSE;
00072     }
00073 }
